title: does anyone know the name of this font?
content:
does anyone know the name of this font?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015025051im_/http:/typophile.com/files/424161_305696422813156_1677892009_n_6518.jpg)
author: flophouse85

comments.content: **[Ruach](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015025051/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Letraset&ffam=Ruach%20LET%20-%20Plain&fid=38516a3373a245a4615ce8d2a680dcb1&fsize=60&text=AMERICAN%20Respect%20All%20JUDO%20%26%20JUJITSU&wrap=2)** by Timothy Donaldson (Letraset, 1990) - also available from ITC
